context.flawed_solution:
#### 3
Basil gets 1/2 in the morning and 1/2 at bedtime so she gets 1/2+1/2 = <<1/2+1/2=1>>1 whole cookie
Basil also gets 2 whole cookies during the day so all total she gets 2+1 =<<2+1=3>>3 whole cookies
